005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidArgumentFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBase64BinaryItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDurationItem;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUntypedAtomicItem;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
027
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Set;
031import java.util.stream.Collectors;
032import java.util.stream.Stream;
033
034import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
035import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
036
037/**
038 * Implements the XPath 3.1
039 * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-min">fn:min</a> and
040 * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-max">fn:max</a>
041 * functions.
042 */
043public final class FnMinMax {
044  private static final String NAME_MIN = "min";
045  private static final String NAME_MAX = "max";
046  /**
047   * Defines the set of primitive atomic item types supported by the min/max
048   * functions. This set is used for type validation and normalization during
049   * comparison operations.
050   */
051  @NonNull
052  private static final Set<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>> PRIMITIVE_ITEM_TYPES = ObjectUtils.notNull(Set.of(
053      IStringItem.class,
054      IBooleanItem.class,
055      IDecimalItem.class,
056      IDurationItem.class,
057      IDateTimeItem.class,
058      IDateItem.class,
059      IBase64BinaryItem.class,
060      IAnyUriItem.class));
061  @NonNull
062  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_MIN = IFunction.builder()
063      .name(NAME_MIN)
064      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
065      .deterministic()
066      .contextIndependent()
067      .focusIndependent()
068      .argument(IArgument.builder()
069          .name("arg")
070          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
071          .zeroOrMore()
072          .build())
073      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
074      .returnZeroOrOne()
075      .functionHandler(FnMinMax::executeMin)
076      .build();
077
078  @NonNull
079  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_MAX = IFunction.builder()
080      .name(NAME_MAX)
081      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
082      .deterministic()
083      .contextIndependent()
084      .focusIndependent()
085      .argument(IArgument.builder()
086          .name("arg")
087          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
088          .zeroOrMore()
089          .build())
090      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
091      .returnZeroOrOne()
092      .functionHandler(FnMinMax::executeMax)
093      .build();
094
095  private FnMinMax() {
096    // disable construction
097  }
098
099  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
100  @NonNull
101  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeMin(
102      @NonNull IFunction function,
103      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
104      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
105      IItem focus) {
106    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
107        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
108
109    return ISequence.of(min(sequence.getValue()));
110  }
111
112  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
113  @NonNull
114  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeMax(
115      @NonNull IFunction function,
116      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
117      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
118      IItem focus) {
119    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
120        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
121
122    return ISequence.of(max(sequence.getValue()));
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
127   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-min">fn:min</a>.
128   *
129   * @param items
130   *          the items to find the minimum value for
131   * @return the average
132   */
133  @Nullable
134  public static IAnyAtomicItem min(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
135    return normalize(items)
136        .min((item1, item2) -> {
137          assert item2 != null;
138          return item1.compareTo(item2);
139        })
140        .orElse(null);
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
145   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-max">fn:max</a>.
146   *
147   * @param items
148   *          the items to find the maximum value for
149   * @return the average
150   */
151  @Nullable
152  public static IAnyAtomicItem max(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
153    return normalize(items)
154        .max((item1, item2) -> {
155          assert item2 != null;
156          return item1.compareTo(item2);
157        })
158        .orElse(null);
159  }
160
161  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn") // readability
162  private static Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> normalize(
163      @NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
164    if (items.isEmpty()) {
165      return Stream.empty();
166    }
167
168    if (items.size() == 1) {
169      return Stream.of(items.get(0));
170    }
171
172    List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> resultingItems = convertUntypedItems(items);
173    Map<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>, Integer> counts = countItemTypes(resultingItems);
174    return createNormalizedStream(resultingItems, counts);
175  }
176
177  @NonNull
178  private static List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> convertUntypedItems(
179      @NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
180    return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()
181        .map(item -> item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem ? IDecimalItem.cast(item) : item)
182        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
183  }
184
185  @NonNull
186  private static Map<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>, Integer> countItemTypes(
187      @NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
188    return FunctionUtils.countTypes(PRIMITIVE_ITEM_TYPES, items);
189  }
190
191  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
192  @NonNull
193  private static Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> createNormalizedStream(
194      @NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items,
195      @NonNull Map<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>, Integer> counts) {
196
197    // Single type - no conversion needed
198    if (counts.size() == 1) {
199      return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream());
200    }
201
202    // Multiple types - attempt conversion
203    int size = items.size();
204    if (counts.size() > 1) {
205      // Check if all items are either String or AnyUri
206      if (counts.getOrDefault(IStringItem.class, 0) + counts.getOrDefault(IAnyUriItem.class, 0) == size) {
207        return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream().map(IAnyAtomicItem::asStringItem));
208      }
209
210      // Check if all items are Decimal
211      if (counts.getOrDefault(IDecimalItem.class, 0) == size) {
212        return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream().map(item -> (IDecimalItem) item));
213      }
214    }
215
216    // No valid conversion possible
217    throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
218        InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TYPE,
219        String.format(
220            "Values must all be of a single atomic type. Found multiple types: [%s]",
221            FunctionUtils.getTypes(items).stream()
222                .map(Class::getSimpleName)
223                .collect(Collectors.joining(", "))));
224  }
225}
